column4: Does ubuntu come with flash, pdf, mp3, dvd support out of the box without any installation?
no, unfortunately it can't due to various laws and restrictions
if you enable the medibuntu repository, and apt-get install libdvdcss2 ubuntu-restricted-extras, you will get pretty much all of that installed for you though
I would point out that windows also cannot play flash, many media formats, or dvd's without adding additional software..
